name: bc-bridge
description: Connect WordPress to BigCommerce for scalable commerce

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npx cleancss -o assets/css/bc-bridge.min.css assets/css/bc-bridge.css && npx cleancss -o assets/css/bc-bridge-admin.min.css assets/css/bc-bridge-admin.css
scripts.build:js: npx terser assets/js/bc-bridge.js -o assets/js/bc-bridge.min.js -c -m && npx terser assets/js/bc-bridge-admin.js -o assets/js/bc-bridge-admin.min.js -c -m
scripts.lint: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run zip

author: BigCommerce
